languages.text: "Исключено. У нас приказ — ни шагу назад. Мы его сами себе отдали. Все хотят отомстить этим мразям за все лишения и муки, которым они их подвергли. А я, считай, мщу сам себе за то какой мразью я был. Может Император надо мной сжалится, если хоть сдохну достойно. А ты спасайся, иначе весь наш героизм пойдет насмарку! Должен же хоть кто-то на самом деле сбежать из этой дыры".

traits.locale_text: "Исключено. У нас приказ — ни шагу назад. Мы его сами себе отдали. Все хотят отомстить этим мразям за все лишения и муки, которым они их подвергли. А я, считай, мщу сам себе за то какой мразью я был. Может Император надо мной сжалится, если хоть сдохну достойно. А ты спасайся, иначе весь наш героизм пойдет насмарку! Должен же хоть кто-то на самом деле сбежать из этой дыры".

languages.text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."
languages.original_text: "Исключено. У нас приказ — ни шагу назад. Мы его сами себе отдали. Все хотят отомстить этим мразям за все лишения и муки, которым они их подвергли. А я, считай, мщу сам себе за то какой мразью я был. Может Император надо мной сжалится, если хоть сдохну достойно. А ты спасайся, иначе весь наш героизм пойдет насмарку! Должен же хоть кто-то на самом деле сбежать из этой дыры".

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. We have our orders: to hold our ground. It's what we ordered ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! Someone has to escape from this hole in earnest."

"Out of the question. We have our orders: to hold our ground. It's what we ordered ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! Someone has to escape from this hole in earnest."

"Out of the question. We have our orders: to hold our ground. We gave it to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this hole."

"Out of the question. We have our orders: to hold our ground. We gave it to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

languages.text: “想都别想，我们必须坚守阵地。这是我们给我们自己下的命令。我们遭受了这么多损失与痛苦，每个人都希望能让那群人渣付出些代价，而我也得为我自己的混蛋行为付出代价。如果我能死得体面些的话，说不定帝皇还会怜悯我呢。至于你，你得赶紧逃出去，否则我们就要白白牺牲了！至少得有个人从这绝望的深渊中逃出去。”
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

traits.locale_text: “想都别想，我们必须坚守阵地。这是我们给我们自己下的命令。我们遭受了这么多损失与痛苦，每个人都希望能让那群人渣付出些代价，而我也得为我自己的混蛋行为付出代价。如果我能死得体面些的话，说不定帝皇还会怜悯我呢。至于你，你得赶紧逃出去，否则我们就要白白牺牲了！至少得有个人从这绝望的深渊中逃出去。”

languages.text: 「それは無理です。我々はここに残ります。これは私たちが自分自身に与えた命です。皆、あのクズどもに自分たちが被ったすべての損失や苦痛を償わせたいと願っているのです。私は自らの行いの代償を払おうと思っています。せめてまともな男として死ねば、皇帝も同情してくれるかもしれません。あなたが逃げなければ我々の奮闘が無駄になります！ひとりだけでもこの絶望の縁から逃げなければ」
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

traits.locale_text: 「それは無理です。我々はここに残ります。これは私たちが自分自身に与えた命です。皆、あのクズどもに自分たちが被ったすべての損失や苦痛を償わせたいと願っているのです。私は自らの行いの代償を払おうと思っています。せめてまともな男として死ねば、皇帝も同情してくれるかもしれません。あなたが逃げなければ我々の奮闘が無駄になります！ひとりだけでもこの絶望の縁から逃げなければ」

languages.text: «Ni pensarlo. Debemos resistir aquí. Es la orden que nosotros mismos nos hemos dado. Todos queremos hacer que estos malnacidos paguen por el dolor y la pérdida que nos han infligido. Y yo debo pagar por ser la clase de desgraciado que he sido. Tal vez si muero como una persona decente el Emperador se apiade de mí. ¡Pero usted tiene que salir de aquí o todas nuestras heroicidades serán en vano! Por lo menos una persona debería poder escapar de esta sima de desesperación».
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

traits.locale_text: «Ni pensarlo. Debemos resistir aquí. Es la orden que nosotros mismos nos hemos dado. Todos queremos hacer que estos malnacidos paguen por el dolor y la pérdida que nos han infligido. Y yo debo pagar por ser la clase de desgraciado que he sido. Tal vez si muero como una persona decente el Emperador se apiade de mí. ¡Pero usted tiene que salir de aquí o todas nuestras heroicidades serán en vano! Por lo menos una persona debería poder escapar de esta sima de desesperación».

languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

languages.text: « Il n'en est pas question. On doit tenir notre position. C'est un ordre qu'on s'est donné. Tout le monde ici veut se venger de ce que ces pourritures leur ont fait subir. Quant à moi, c'est ma punition pour avoir été moi-même une ordure. Qui sait, peut-être que l'Empereur me prendra en pitié si je meurs en homme honnête. Vous devriez partir d'ici, sinon notre héroïsme n'aura servi à rien ! Et puis comme ça, au moins l'{mf|un|une} d'entre nous se sera {mf|échappé|échappée} de cette fosse de désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'en est pas question. On doit tenir notre position. C'est un ordre qu'on s'est donné. Tout le monde ici veut se venger de ce que ces pourritures leur ont fait subir. Quant à moi, c'est ma punition pour avoir été moi-même une ordure. Qui sait, peut-être que l'Empereur me prendra en pitié si je meurs en homme honnête. Vous devriez partir d'ici, sinon notre héroïsme n'aura servi à rien ! Et puis comme ça, au moins l'{mf|un|une} d'entre nous se sera {mf|échappé|échappée} de cette fosse de désespoir. »

languages.text: "Kommt nicht infrage. Wir müssen unsere Stellung halten. Diesen Befehl haben wir uns selbst erteilt. Alle wollen, dass der Abschaum für die Verluste und Schmerzen bezahlt, die wir erlitten haben. Und ich werde dafür bezahlen, dass ich selbst so ein Abschaum war. Vielleicht lässt der Imperator Gnade walten, wenn ich wenigstens als anständiger Mann sterbe. Und Ihr solltet Euch absetzen, damit unser Heldenmut nicht umsonst ist! Zumindest eine Person sollte tatsächlich aus dieser Grube der Verzweiflung entkommen."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt nicht infrage. Wir müssen unsere Stellung halten. Diesen Befehl haben wir uns selbst erteilt. Alle wollen, dass der Abschaum für die Verluste und Schmerzen bezahlt, die wir erlitten haben. Und ich werde dafür bezahlen, dass ich selbst so ein Abschaum war. Vielleicht lässt der Imperator Gnade walten, wenn ich wenigstens als anständiger Mann sterbe. Und Ihr solltet Euch absetzen, damit unser Heldenmut nicht umsonst ist! Zumindest eine Person sollte tatsächlich aus dieser Grube der Verzweiflung entkommen."

languages.text: "Mümkün değil. Sebat etmeliyiz. Kendimize emir verdik. Buradaki her bir fert, o şerefsizlere yaptıkları katliamın ve çektirdikleri acıların bedelini ödetmek istiyor. Ben de kendi alçaklığımın bedelini ödeyeceğim. Son nefesimi haysiyetli bir adam olarak verirsem İmparator'un merhametine sığınabilirim. Ancak sizin gitmeniz gerekiyor, dökülen kanı boşa çıkarmayın! Bu çaresizlik çukurundan kaçın, uzaklaşın bir an önce."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. We must hold our ground. It is an order we have given to ourselves. Everyone wants to make those scum pay for all the loss and pain they've suffered. And I'm making myself pay for being the scum that I was. Maybe the Emperor will take pity on me if I at least die a decent man. And you should get out of here, or our heroism will be for nothing! At least one person should truly escape from this pit of despair."

traits.locale_text: "Mümkün değil. Sebat etmeliyiz. Bu, kendimize verdiğimiz bir emir. Buradaki her bir fert, yaptıkları katliamın ve çektirdikleri acıların bedelini, o şerefsizlere ödetmek istiyor. Ben de kendi pisliğimin bedelini ödeyeceğim. Düzgün bir adam olarak, dimdik ölürsem İmparator'un merhametine sığınabilirim. Ancak sizin gitmeniz gerekiyor, dökülen kanı boşa çıkarmayın! Bu çaresizlik çukurundan kaçın, uzaklaşın bir an önce."
